name: Life is Strange: Before the Storm - Episode 2: Brave New World
name_original: Life is Strange: Before the Storm - Episode 2: Brave New World
description:
Life is Strange: Before the Storm - Episode 2: Brave New World is an adventure game. It came out on 19-10-2017. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Life is Strange: Before the Storm - Episode 2: Brave New World is available on PC.
